item.title: Education
item.description: * /* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */ .timeline { position: relative; max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto; } /* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */ .timeline::after { content: ''; position: absolute; width: 6px; background-color:black; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 50%; margin-left: -3px; } /* Container around content */ .containers { padding: 10px 40px; position: relative; background-color: inherit; width: 50%; } /* The circles on the timeline */ .
